actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the State of Tennessee for the purpose of erecting a highway sign to inform motorists of the location of the Living Heritage Museum in McMinn County, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the State of Tennessee for the purpose of erecting a highway sign to inform motorists of the location of the Living Heritage Museum in McMinn County, Tennessee.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the State of Tennessee for the purpose of erecting a highway sign to inform motorists of the location of the Living Heritage Museum in McMinn County, Tennessee.
